location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 41: Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra], to Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter Samuel Manesty informs Edward Galley of the movements of the Scorpion,commanded by Captain Charles Pickett. Manesty explains that he was placed in temporary charge of the Residency at Bussora [Basra] in November 1784, and that he has since been appointed to manage the Honourable Company's concerns at that place.
